title: FriendlyFace â€” Forensic-Friendly AI Platform
description:
Full 6-layer forensic-friendly AI facial recognition platform implementing Mohammed's ICDF2C 2024 schema with SOTA 2026 components.

Layers:
1. Recognition (PCA+SVM)
2. FL Engine (Flower + poisoning detection)
3. Blockchain Forensic (MVP COMPLETE)
4. Fairness Auditor (demographic parity + equalized odds)
5. Explainability (LIME + SHAP)
6. Consent & Governance (EU AI Act readiness)

19 user stories. Quality gates: pytest + ruff.

title: US-001: Install ruff and configure linting
description:
As a developer, I want ruff configured as the project linter so that code quality is enforced consistently.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] ruff added to [project.optional-dependencies.dev] in pyproject.toml
- [ ] [tool.ruff] section configured in pyproject.toml with Python 3.11 target
- [ ] ruff check friendlyface/ passes with zero errors on existing code
- [ ] ruff check tests/ passes with zero errors on existing code
- [ ] cd ~/friendlyface && source .venv/bin/activate && pytest tests/ -v passes
- [ ] cd ~/friendlyface && source .venv/bin/activate && ruff check friendlyface/ passes
